comments:
Creating a visual example, after stepping through the wizard, pressing the
Finish button does not do anything and does not dismiss the wizard.  This is the
NPE that's thrown:

The problem was breaking API changes due to move to M7. Fixed in classes
NewVisualClassCreationWizard and VisualClassExampleWizard.
*** Bug 53100 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
